attributes.comment:
Referencing the U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services, docket number
(USCIS-2006-0044 in its bid to increase the adoption fees.

Myself and my wife are of course against the proposed increase in fees for foreign
adoption. We have already payed the current fees and are awaiting a referral from
China. As it is, we will most likely have to renew our papers, as the referral will
most likely come after the expiration date. This will only increase our financial
heartship and will not serve any greater purpose.

Increasing the fees further could hurt the foreign adoption program in general as it
will put more finanical burden on adoptive families. In the least, any families
already starting the process should not have to pay the increased fees, as they
should be "grandfathered in".

Please reconsider the increase in the fees, thus making it more affordable for
adoption of unwanted foriegn children.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Ed Feldshau
